definition: linked in a chain
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
surname Lian
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to tie the knot (idiom)/to get married

sentences.english: Bob and Mary will tie the knot next year after years of dating.
sentences.chinese: 鮑伯和瑪莉交往多年後，明年將共結連理。

sentences.english: You need to begin connecting to other Hearts in order to get the upgrades.
sentences.chinese: 你還需要與其他的心相結連，才能昇華。

sentences.english: Core pipe is connected with cooling boards in bulged style.
sentences.chinese: 芯管與散熱片之間也進行脹結連接。

sentences.english: For me, the highlight of the book was when the two main characters got married.
sentences.chinese: 對我來說，本書最精彩的部分是兩位主角共結連理時。

sentences.english: When young people marry, they have just a small idea about what a marriage is all about.
sentences.chinese: 當一對年輕人共結連理時，對婚姻知之甚少。

sentences.english: The knot, to wish happiness with.
sentences.chinese: 喜結連理日，恭祝幸福隨。

sentences.english: Do you think they are really happy to get married or is it supposed to be a speculation?
sentences.chinese: 認爲他們是喜結連理，或是有意的“炒作”？

sentences.english: To join securely, as with glue OR cement.
sentences.chinese: 象用膠或水泥一樣牢固地結連在一起。
他們倆在2006年6月共結連理。

sentences.english: Norrington: Our destinies have been entwined, Elizabeth…but never joined.
sentences.chinese: 我們命運交纏，伊麗莎白，但無緣結連理。

definition: the shrike and the swallow fly in different directions (idiom)/(usually of a couple) to part from each other
lit. to lift the tray to eyebrow level (idiom); mutual respect in a marriage
to act as a matchmaker
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
the appearance of unity, but divided at heart (idiom); seeming harmony belies underlying disagreement
long-cherished wish
to part on bad terms/(of a meeting etc) to break up in discord
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
(in former times) to bind one's hair on coming of age
to feel hatred/to harbor a grudge
stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
loath to part (idiom); emotionally close and unwilling to separate
penniless
to share tribulations/to help sb with worries and difficulties
to get oneself a wife/to take a daughter-in-law
honorable even in defeat (idiom)
